CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 27, 1973, pg. 21 reads: " Welcome Visitors - Mr. and Mrs. Marrion Matthews of Birmingham, Ala., were welcome guests in the lovely home of Mr. and Mrs. Lucell Matthews, Sr., his brother and sister-in-law on Blackadore St., recently. While here they also visited a sister, Mrs. Katy Bryant, and were frequent visitors at Wesley Center AME Zion Church, along with members of the family here. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Mr. and Mrs. Marrion Matthews, standing at bottom of staircase in home of Mr. and Mrs. Lucell Matthews, Sr., Blackadore Street
